availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Malvina Shepherd. Father of James N. Shepherd, J.S. Shepherd, R.H. Shepherd, and William E. Shepherd. Laborer in Bullitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 210. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District no. 3, p. 812. Find A Grave, "James F. Shepherd (1831-1881)," Memorial # 28985216, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28985216 (accessed September 6, 2018).
